pullrequest.title: Link to tool for automatic mesh geometry computation and cleanup.

content.raw:
The tool works well for me, I think it's nice to have it listed on the tutorial. Approved. Please do leave a note here when you make the code public, just in case people have feedback. And also let us know if you plan on taking the website down.

Regarding volume, I can't think of a way to compensate for the mesh scale unless I calculate by hand after running your tool. See the two cones below, the one on the right is scaled 10x to have a reasonable size next to the car, while the one on the left has the original scale, they both use the inertia from your tool.

![cones.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/RMMxjX/images/2542072818-cones.png)
